projects.title: skyForecast
projects.description: A clean and responsive weather application that provides current conditions, detailed metrics, and a 7-day forecast using real-time data from the Open-Meteo API.
projects.architecture: Client-side single-page application built with React and Vite, featuring modular components for current weather, forecast details, and weekly predictions.

projects.title: CSS2TW
projects.description: A lightweight web tool that converts traditional CSS into Tailwind utility classes, featuring smart autocomplete to help developers learn and recall syntax while they type.
projects.architecture: Client-side single-page application built with React and Vite, using a custom CSS-to-Tailwind mapping engine and Monaco Editor for live autocomplete and code editing.

projects.title: UniConnect
projects.description: A university-focused social network designed to connect students through posts, profiles and interactions, with strong emphasis on security, scalability and clean UI/UX.
projects.architecture: Full-stack MVC architecture with RESTful API, separated frontend and backend layers, and a relational database schema designed for scalability.

projects.title: Wild Buddy
projects.description: A machine learning project focused on animal identification and tracking, designed to assist students, researchers and wildlife enthusiasts.
projects.architecture: Modular Python application with separated data processing, model inference and visualization layers.

projects.title: Deadline Hell
projects.description: A productivity web application built to help students track deadlines, assessments and academic workload efficiently.
projects.architecture: Server-rendered web application with Express, structured routing and database-driven task management.

projects.title: Bakio Surf Cleaner
projects.description: A desktop application created for a surf school to automatically clean and organize session video clips, saving time for instructors and staff.
projects.architecture: Standalone desktop application with a simple GUI layer and a backend processing engine for video management.
